title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until golden.
In a pan, sauté onion and garlic in butter.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes, season, and serve with rice or naan.

title: Fruit Salad
summary: Slices  of fruit all mixed up in one bowl , served with a side of yoghurt, waffles and honey
instructions: Wash and prepare all fruits (slice, chop, or cube them).
In a large mixing bowl, combine strawberries, pineapple, banana, apple, kiwi, grapes, and blueberries.
Gently toss fruits to mix evenly without squishing them.
Serve fruit mixture in individual bowls.
Add a spoonful of yogurt on the side.
Place mini waffles next to the bowl.
Drizzle honey over fruit salad or serve it separately in a small dish.
